title: Dog Park, Courtyard, Double Sink Vanities
posting_body: ['YES, WE ARE OPEN!', 'CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR!', 'OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!', 'Located right by the Texas Medical Center, The Halstead Apartments connects you to the best of Houston living.', 'Designer features like granite countertops and 10-foot ceilings with crown molding will make you proud to call any of our one and two-bedroom apartments home in Houston.', ' Our Braeswood apartments offer convenience to Meyerland Plaza, making running everyday errands a breeze.', 'And when the weekend arrives, you can treat yourself to some retail therapy at Galleria Houston, see your favorite band play at Stereo Live Houston, or drive into Downtown Houston to explore all its entertainment and nightlife hotspots.', ' Come home to The Halstead today!', 'Amenities Include:', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Media Room', 'Courtyard', 'Ice Maker', 'Energy Efficient Appliances', 'Resort-Style Pool and Lap Swimming Pool', 'Linen Closets', 'On-Site Management', 'BBQ/Picnic Area', 'Business Center', 'Dual Vanity Sinks', 'Glass-Door Showers and Deep-Soaking Garden Bathtubs', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
